review: Worked as it was advertised. However I did download a separate app to transmit my phone pics to tv screen. Now works well for all asked of it.
author: Jerilin M Gregouire

review: Google chrome cast is well worth it, that is of course if you have the good apps that go well with it. It's useful to those who don't have a smart tv but have Netflix, Pandora, and use YouTube. My personal downside is that my windows surface tablet is not compatible with Google Chromecast, but that's not why I rated the item a four star. Connecting an electronic device can be kinda complicated to those who aren't familiar with electronic devices. I struggled to connect my phone to my Chromecast because I wasn't familiar with the device, and there isn't any instruction manuals step by step to connect other then the three steps on the box when you open it. Over all it's a good item to own when or if traveling or have in the house.
author: Diego

review: Got it in 2 days so far so good
author: Salena

review: All the apps I use I can find on my very basic smart television, I have the Chromecast plugged in but hardly use it.  I find it almost useless now.
author: L. Calderon "The One."

review: Absolute piece of crap.  Always freezes up and won't stop playing even after you close app + turn phone off + anything humanly possible besides ripping it out from your TV.  Be a better person than me and buy a ROKU.
author: Timothy Lederman

review: I thought this going to be like ROKU or at least it would allow me to use the APPS on my phone that I downloaded thru Google Playstore. It isnt I can only use NETFLIX, YOU TUBE AND HULU with it I assumed that I would be able to use PANDORA or FACEBOOK you have to go thru extra steps to get your FACEBOOK to work with it. ROKU has a Streaming Media Player just like this one that is much better and offers you a better variety AMAZON MEDIA PLAYER  included
author: Robert Taylor
